channel.title: DeFi on CEO Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in DeFi on CEO Playbook

item.title: The Future of Finance: All About Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: An overview of how Embedded, Open, and Decentralized Finance are converging to reshape the global financial landscape.

item.title: Vinne
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: App that makes it easy for anyone to earn a yield on DeFi holdings.

item.title: Cardano
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: Partnership between UBX and the Cardano Foundation, marking the launch of the first public stake pool in the Philippines operated by a regulated financial institution.
